text:
The Director of Public Works shall include provision for street lighting in a manner satisfactory to the Public Utilities Commission in all plans, maps, plats and specifications for street openings and improvements made by the City and County. 
(Bill No. 395, Ord. No. 15.0611(C.S.), Sec. 2)

heading.catch_text: INCLUSION OF STREET LIGHTING IN PLANS, ETC., FOR STREET OPENINGS AND IMPROVEMENTS.
